title: Video Audio Quality
content: I mainly take videos to record my parrot talking. Mostly me talking back and forth with him. On the pixel 3 it sounds like I am screaming and you can barely hear him talking. It's almost like they are trying to block his sound out! I think the Pixel is trying to be too clever with their new block out background feature, it sucks and ruining videos of my bird saying hilarious things. Any solutions? Can I turn this noise cancleing feature off?
